# calculating 95% C.I.
z_critical <- qnorm(0.975)

ci <- c(
  (x1_bar - x2_bar) - z_critical * sqrt((var1/n1) + (var2/n2)), 
  (x1_bar - x2_bar) + z_critical * sqrt((var1/n1) + (var2/n2))
)
ci <- round(ci, 2)
